Column.name: CityMoveCostModifier
Column.notes: Only relevant to cities able to move (e.g. aquatic cities)

Column.name: WaterAccess
Column.notes: This flag indicates the building MUST be built in a city with access to water (coastal cities are valid)

Column.name: WaterOnly
Column.notes: This flag indicates the building MUST be built in a city ON the water

Column.name: Land
Column.notes: This flag indicates the building MUST be built in a city on land
